title: Royal Enfield likely to record highest-ever sales in FY23
description: Even if the company manages to sell motorcycles at the current rate of 80,000 units a month, it is likely to record sales of 880,000 units by the end of this fiscal, as per ET's analysis. That is 47% more than what Royal Enfield sold in FY22, and about 7% higher than its previous highest annual sale of around 822,000 units in FY19.
